3.title: Search for the Lost Lab

episode of.title: Tesla's Death Ray: A Murder Declassified (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Aron and his team are hard at work on their reconstruction of Tesla's "Death Ray". Meanwhile Jack and Cameron travel to Colorado Springs to search for the former site of Tesla's experimental laboratory, in hopes of finding more clues about the weapon.

7.title: Superweapon Conspiracy

episode of.title: Tesla's Death Ray: A Murder Declassified (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: As the team investigates Nikola Tesla's suspicious death, they pursue leads to the CIA and FBI in search of his missing notes. Will the Death Ray prototype work and was it a motive for murder?

8.title: A Suspect in Serbia

episode of.title: Tesla's Death Ray: A Murder Declassified (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Following Aron's successful test of his Death Ray, proving the revolutionary weapon could be real, Jack shifts his focus to Nikola Tesla's potential murder. The first suspect sends Jack and Cameron overseas to Serbia to look for clues.

11.title: In Hitler's Crosshairs

episode of.title: Tesla's Death Ray: A Murder Declassified (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: The investigation of Tesla's suspicious death and missing documents continues. The team travels to Serbia, Tesla's homeland, and discovers never before seen documents drawn by Tesla himself. The Death Ray build moves ahead

imdb.plot outline: Nikola Tesla was the most famous mind of his time. In 1943, Tesla was found dead in a hotel room, his research missing. The FBI declassified documents that reveal new information about Tesla's conceived Death Ray and the files lead experts to believe a full investigation is needed to determine what happened to Tesla.
imdb.title: Tesla's Death Ray: A Murder Declassified
akas: Tesla's Death Ray: A Murder Declassified (United States)
plot: Nikola Tesla was the most famous mind of his time. In 1943, Tesla was found dead in a hotel room, his research missing. The FBI declassified documents that reveal new information about Tesla's conceived Death Ray and the files lead experts to believe a full investigation is needed to determine what happened to Tesla.
